response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a discounted rate compared to its market value of $1,000,000. I trust this proposal aligns with your financial considerations and strategic goals. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 950000}
